I am currently developing a blueprint for the fintech ecosystem in hiring leaders to guide slice's transition from a fintech company to a full-fledged bank.

I am also overseeing Technology and Design hiring

positions.subtitle: slice
positions.description: Being one of the founding recruiters at slice enabled me to build the entire Tech and Design teams from ground up. We built the Tech team from 15 members to 300+ and the Design team from 3 to 30.  I also initiated Campus hiring and I am currently focused on building strategies for diversity and referrals.

experience.title: Technical Recruiter
experience.description: I got the opportunity to work on the vendor side of recruitment and I worked very closely with Fintech/Financial Technology start-ups, MNCs and High frequency trading firms across APAC, Europe, Australia and the United States. The Roles I looked into were Software development, Mobile development, Network engineering, DevOps, SDET, Traders, Analysts etc.

experience.title: Talent Acquisition Specialist
experience.description: My recruitment career shot up from here. Worked with some brilliant folks and built the Mumbai & Hyderabad Tech, Business Analyst & Data Science teams from scratch. Hired 80+ folks and was given a 5/5 rating in the annual reviews. I initiated the campus hiring at Toppr.

recommendations: Shouvik Roy ‚ÄúI had the pleasure of interacting with Sreenu while interviewing for Slice. Sreenu has handled the interviewing experience smoothly and efficiently. He is one of the most honest, transparent recruiters I've met in my career. Throughout the process, he has given me detailed and timely feedback as well as insights into the hiring process and culture at Slice. One of the few things I've cherished is the fact that we were able to have open conversations regarding the company culture, work life balance, mission and vision and all important parameters which one needs before choosing a new role. I would highly recommend Sreenu for being a highly genuine and professional Recruiter.‚Äù

Abhishek Kumar ‚ÄúI had a chance to interact with Sreenu during my interviews with Slice. He is one of the most effective recruiters I have had the chance to meet in my career so far. His persuasive skills, combined with Slice's wonderful hiring culture creates a phenomenal impact on good candidates while they decide to join a company among the multiple offers they have. Sreenu is the most apt brand ambassador of Slice as its Senior Talent Acquisition Specialist and a great asset to the company.‚Äù
